column1: Funeral services for Mrs. Guy will be at 2:00 PM
column5: at the First Baptist Church in Waurika
column6: with Ron Wilson of Nocona officiating. Burial will follow in the Waurika Cemetery under the direction of Dudley Funeral Home. Visitation will be at the Dudley Funeral Home Chapel in Waurika from 2:00 to 7:00 PM
